value.description: Specifies that the value of the option is the value of an attribute of the option object
value.description_zh: 指定选项的值为选项对象的某个属性值

label.description: Specifies that the node label is a property value of the node object
label.description_zh: 指定节点标签为节点对象的某个属性值

options.description: Specifies that the sub-option of an option is a property value of the option object
options.description_zh: 指定选项的子选项为选项对象的某个属性值

disabled.description: Specifies that the option is disabled as a property value of the option object
disabled.description_zh: 指定选项的禁用为选项对象的某个属性值

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the selected value changes
events.description_zh: 选中值发生变化时触发

events.name: visible-change
events.description: Triggered when the drop-down box appears/hides
events.params: 出现则为 true，隐藏则为 false
events.description_zh: 下拉框出现/隐藏时触发

events.name: remove-tag
events.description: Triggered when a tag is removed in multi-select mode
events.description_zh: 多选模式下移除tag时触发

events.name: clear
events.description: Clearable radio mode is triggered when the user clicks the clear button
events.description_zh: 可清空的单选模式下用户点击清空按钮时触发

events.name: blur
events.description_zh: 当 input 失去焦点时触发

events.name: focus
events.description_zh: 当 input 获得焦点时触发

slots.name: empty
slots.description: A list when there are no options
